ai-anya-e0105n15:1_0: How on earth was his name when the Great Beyond Many kingdom was born in the Great Monastery, since he was in his name.
ai-anya-e0105n15:1_1: Now it is indicated by the carts in all their doctrines, it is not possible to discuss the worst kind of scriptures.
ai-anya-e0105n15:1_3: (They replied:) “As sort of diseases, so why do you imagine that he had come from?
ai-anya-e0105n15:2_0: “Here there is no fruit belonging to the Sangha. A sangha that is fruitful and results in the path that is good. There is nothing that can be said.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:3_0: “The Saṅgha is acting like this. It’s why it’s not worthy of a religious donation. That’s why it’s not possible to go on your right here.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:4_0: “The Sangha is acting like this, and the Sangha does not eat whatever is leftover offerings,” and they do not eat any food.
ai-anya-e0105n15:5_0: the Community is very fruitful, and unable to give them any idea. That’s why it’s not possible to receive alms-food at the right time.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:6_0: “The Buddhas use nothing that is inspected through anything, and that is why it’s given to one who is not? That is why it’s not so very fruitful or beneficial or reward.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:7_0: “The Buddha is residing in the Tusita realm. He is coming back to the human realm, he doesn’t show his way to the human world.” And he said, “I’ll give it up.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:8_0: “The Buddha has taught the Dhamma for the purpose of seeing Dhamma (wholesomen) with his own hands, and with Venerable Ānanda taught him the Dhamma, and you haven’t conveyed him with Venerable Ānanda.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:9_1: But this is the meaning here:
ai-anya-e0105n15:9_2: The one observed by doing, one of the debates (.) one, and one of using preference, meaning to kill, gave having sexual intercourse with, one, with aiming to give, one person with wisdom, and one having gained faith in this way: “We will not give,” or “We will set aside that woman.”
ai-anya-e0105n15:10_0: And here the discourses or the texts on monastic training, including the four ways, is included in the discourses and the Vinaya.
ai-anya-e0105n15:10_1: (Anything) the three (supernatural) doctrines that he created (abody) doctrines.
ai-anya-e0105n15:10_2: However, one who does not have a bad view, one who denies abusive speech,
ai-anya-e0105n15:11_0: But on the true doctrine of the Jewels, dissatisfaction with the Good Doctrine, or with the intent on awakening, therefore the in the true Faith he can be understood as mentioned in the Doctrine of the Enlightened One’s Doctrine.”
